value:
It does feel a bit strange to be called
a Hero... But I am nevertheless quite
curious about this world of yours.

My brother tends to stick his nose
into my business more often than
he does not.$k$pPrince Alfonse is completely
different in that regard...

Ah, might I ask what it is you are busy
doing? If there is any way I might
help, please do not hesitate to ask.

Do you know of any place where
I might find delicious seafood on the
menu? Fish is my favorite, you see.

I have been speaking with everyone
I meet here. I am delighted to learn
about the lives of the townspeople!

I have come with greetings
on behalf of $Nf.

I feel my strength has grown
an incredible amount!
All in all, I feel rather nice.

Perhaps I have reached an age where
my growth has slowed...

I am touched that you would offer
me this power. Thank you.

I am Seteth's younger sister, Flayn.
Now that I have introduced myself,
where exactly am I?

When I arrived in this world I was
always bewildered and perplexed,
but now I am only enjoying myself.$k$pFrom food to clothing, everything
is new and fresh here... The Askran
people, all the Heroes...$k$pEveryone and everything is a delight!$k$pAnd then there is you, as new and
as fresh as it seems possible to be.$k$pYour presence is unique in its feel.
Deep...and mysterious. Hmm...$k$pYou remind me of...water? No! A fish.
I can try to grasp you, but you swim
through my fingers whenever I try...$k$pAnd like a fish, I believe if I ever
managed to catch you, the reward
would be ever so sweet...$k$pWith that, I have whet my appetite
for fish, so I am off to find some...
Would you care to join me?
(exertion)
(exertion)
(exertion)
(exertion)
I cannot lose!
Stand aside!
Child's play!
I'm sorryâ€”it must be done!
Mother... Soon...
Hello!
Do let me know if I may help with anything.
Greetings!
Do you know much about the ocean? I simply adore gazing upon the deep, blue water...
Do not worry, as I plan to give it my all. I love experiencing new things!
I do not need you to worry about me. My brother does enough of that for the both of you.
How delightful to be somewhere so lively!
I do believe I shall be most useful to you!
Of course!
Is something afoot?
Away we go!
